description:
Tree works in rear garden subject to Olive Section House, Canonbury South, No. 145, TPO 1995. 

 Works:  Maple (T10)     Crown lift 3m., remove horizontal                         laterals growing directly towards                         building to allow 3m., clearance,                         crown thin 35%, deadwood. 

         Plane (T11)     Crown lift 6m., crown thin 35%-40%,                         remove horizontal laterals growing                         towards and over building to allow                         3m., clearance, deadwood. 

         Sycamore (T12)  Crown lift 4m., crown thin 35%-40%,                         deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
